import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UpcomingSessions=()=>{const{currentStudent}=useStudent();// Get the current student from context

};new Notification('Upcoming Session Reminder',options);}else if(Notification.permission==='default'){// If permission has not been requested yet, request it
